properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Rockingham; Coastal York
properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 7 at 3:27AM EST until February 7 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Isolated minor coastal flood possible.

* WHERE...In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. In Maine,
Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties.

* WHEN...From 8 AM to 11 AM EST Friday.

* TIDAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying vulnerable locations
near the waterfront can be expected with up to a foot inundation
in some low lying areas. Flooding will occur along parking lots,
parks and roads with only isolated road closures expected..

* WAVE IMPACTS...Some minor beach erosion expected with partial
erosion of vulnerable dunes. Minor splash-over expected.

* TIDAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Minor flooding of low-lying vulnerable
locations near the waterfront possible.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 AM EST THIS MORNING
